documents.document: @ComicPrintingUK @badmachinery *slow clap*
@TheAhmedRaafat we all thought you knew.
@thalestral oh, you are in for a treat!
@thalestral I'm presuming you watched... pretty much the entirety of last year's Wrestle Kingdom? It was pretty excellent all over.
@CianTormey damn, that's an intense bunny.
@thalestral Nakamura/Styles from... I want to say WK 2015. Pure gold.
Donald Trump fires acting attorney general for defying travel ban (via @IrishTimes) https://t.co/hAqeotipA6
@DavidpbFerguson I think it's become an "Us vs. Them" mentality for WWE. They do what they want, and snyone who complains is a smark.
Worth a read re. Trump testing the boundaries of his presidency. https://t.co/wyWqt9aiTa
@ComicPrintingUK hey, if that's the only problem you have with me, I think we're doing pretty well.
@ComicPrintingUK I HAVE been thinking of stepping into the world of YouTube or podcasting. Or maybe I'll just have a sandwich.
@ComicPrintingUK well then I'd go back to openly weeping and begging.
@ComicPrintingUK I assume so. They'll smack you right in the labonza... or some such.
@ComicPrintingUK New plan. Try crying.
@ComicPrintingUK it's OK. You'll be OK. It's not at all a bankruptcy warning.
@ComicPrintingUK maybe he's trying to put off some REALLY bad news.
@ComicPrintingUK ... that wouldn't be catastrophic. Well. It wouldn't be terribly catastrophic. But at that point, just hire an assistant?
@ComicPrintingUK both good points. Now what I will say is, if you wanted to outsource to someone you've vetted and trained in some way...
@ComicPrintingUK ah. Yeah. So. No. I mean, we rushed those books last year, but I usually like a lot of communication with a printer.
@ComicPrintingUK I dunno. Do I know them? I know you. I know your standards.
@ComicPrintingUK you COULD outsource. Or. You could finish the accounts and go get a burger.
This week is your last chance to get out there and vote (for me? who knows?) in the ICNs! Do it! Do the thing! https://t.co/Amobcgy7l2
@AdlaiM many love hearts.
@JaneMahony and rightfully so. Trump's insular attitude and contempt for... can I say everyone? It has the potential to do real damage.
Seems like the only logical reaction here is to keep punching Nazis. You know. Crush the movement before it gains m… https://t.co/KMXG2HBOPd
@carlospedroart @Katiecanartgood yes! Beer! Maybe more then one. I say we go rogue!
@UmarDitta @Katiecanartgood that's one hell of an offer.
@codenamewallaby @Katiecanartgood GO! Also bring coffee. For me. Please and thank you.
@Katiecanartgood I'll be there as a punter myself with Kerrie. This year is party year!
@UmarDitta @Katiecanartgood does your inn provide coffee?
@Katiecanartgood it happens. Life gets in the way of comics. Coffee will help.
@Katiecanartgood go anyway. Go as a punter. Get a portfolio review. Meet some writiers and artists you want to work with.
@julienickart I'd recommend it. Phantom stanks are not the best.
Yuk, Clontarf Road station currently stinks of rotting garbage. Weirdly, there is no garbage, rotting or otherwise anywhere in sight.
Wish I could thumbs up the PPV but thumbs down the the headline match. https://t.co/NON7KWRwxL
@johnlees927 that's exactly what @pocketkerrie and I have been saying.
@johnlees927 absolutely. Much better move would have been to have him screw over Strowman and start that feud.
@johnlees927 absolutely. The audience was furious. Then disinterested. Then a few of them close to the front started to leave.
@HugoBoylan I think it's about time the "Reigns as unstoppable babyface" experiment was put to bed. How many live crowds have to die?
@HugoBoylan the audience genuinely hated Reigns coming down at 30. Upside. That's the biggest pop Randy Orton's got in about 2 years.
I like Reigns as a performer, but he's gone and turned what is traditionally my favorite WWE PPV, to my least favorite.
I... I think I might love @BraunStrowman. That was just amazing. #RoyalRumble
@DavidpbFerguson I agree. Cross and Asuka in a stipulation match (tables?) could be magic. Sanity would look well with the women's belt.
@DavidpbFerguson but she didn't seem to get a consistent advantage.
@DavidpbFerguson interesting. Gotta say I never really considered Cross as a massive threat in that match. She was aggressive, sure...
@DavidpbFerguson they seem to want to push the Aussies. Wouldn't be surprised to see them take on Cross for a no.1 contender.
@DavidpbFerguson yep. Think DIY and AoP stole the show.
@TheAhmedRaafat you've got that right.
@TheAhmedRaafat I'd see it as more of a horror show.
@nick_gonzo talkin bout scary comics, when you haven't read Malevolence? Tut tut tut #vagueselfpromotion
@TaraaFerguson they miss you too. They've put "Lost Tara" posters everywhere.
@TaraaFerguson Flaming Wok called. They want you back.
By all accounts a roaring (and traditional) Irish trade. https://t.co/6PzTVLLyum
Not loving this Orwellian future at all. Can we get back on track for that Huxley future we were steering towards? https://t.co/3OHM1L0T57
@Treestumped I completely agree. It would be a great step in the right direction.
@Treestumped don't celebrate just yet. There's a little way to go before it's enacted.
@nellucnhoj I really can't. The work is a part of the creator and the creator is a part of the work. Context is important.
Hey, one of these images looks like something I may be involved in. Hmmm. https://t.co/ZwyFG3L72k
@LCSValkyries from working with her and following her work, I've got to say @Treestumped is a superstar in the making.
@TheFinalSam haha! Geeks rejoice! Here's to more experimentation!

For reals though, if you proffer an absurd hypothetical, you must expect absurd answers.
Now back to writing my ma… https://t.co/xM1MP02fvy

Woah! This whole bomb/baby thing is starting lots of fights and creating a lot of terrorist baby jokes!
I'm firmly in the terrorbaby camp.
@DanielFahy you misunderstand me. I like the game and the concept. It just doesn't have the same feeling or gameplay of a traditional ResE.
@DanielFahy the puzzle elements are great, and as a spin-off game I'd be thrilled. It just doesn't feel like the next main titles ResE.
@HugoBoylan it probably sounds like a lot of moaning, but sometimes you just want to dance with who brung ya.
@HugoBoylan I'm really hoping Mass Effect Andromeda is a little closer to the gameplay I'm expecting.
@HugoBoylan KH2.8... eh. I'll give it a proper chance. Just not tonight. I need to be in the right mood to try the new gameplay elements.
@HugoBoylan I'll need to clear a solid weekend for ResEVII, and I will, but I'm no longer in a great rush to do so.
@HugoBoylan while both games seem like a lot of fun, neither are REALLY what I expected from either franchise. That's a little disappointing
@HugoBoylan KH2.8 is OK. Never played Dream Drop Distance before. Seems like a decent performer. Wish they'd stuck to the KH gameplay.
@HugoBoylan ResEVII is fun. Atmospheric. Will play it to completion at some point. It's not a Resident Evil title. At all. Not even close.
@HugoBoylan quick first impressions of both games:
Picked up two games I'd been waiting on for ages today. Resident Evil VII: Biohazard and Kingdom Hearts 2.8
@declanshalvey @ChrisOHalloran words have failed me, utterly. https://t.co/oJi9mJPPft

@declanshalvey @ChrisOHalloran the glass has shattered...
So when's the Hookjaw/Punisher we're all waiting on?
@declanshalvey I saw that cover! That's why these pages struck me! You sir, give good shark.
Dec should definitely draw more sharks. Like, substantially more sharks. https://t.co/tg9J93mQWm
@UmarDitta make it amazing my friend.
@UmarDitta only beer can help you now.
@codenamewallaby @Treestumped par for the course for Tree at this point. Eyemeltingly good work.

@UmarDitta @Katiecanartgood and I'll cry beautiful tears as he adds KO to the list of Jericho.
Drink it in maaaaaaan.
@DontStopRewop roll them together "Rage'
@DontStopRewop for a wandering character, the middle one is ace. A little cosmetic damage, but it's loaded with character and tells a story.

@DontStopRewop ah ok. Well then if that's the case, I've got to say...
Love it! Love it so much!
@DontStopRewop does she summon a different staff based on the magic she's using?
@UmarDitta and it was beautiful. I snorted. I loud-snorted.
@bru_bat it's the passion. The passion of the Bruno.
@UmarDitta I liked when Warrior turned up. Felt natural.
@UmarDitta took a break to get home from work. That went bonkers fast. Nice. Very nice.
@UmarDitta 'specially when you grind it up and snort it.
@UmarDitta (quick note, I'm loving the sound effects.)
@UmarDitta oh yeah, that may have done the trick.
@UmarDitta is there ANY other way to write Suburban Commando fanfic?
@UmarDitta CHRIST! I WAS FROZEN TODAY!
@UmarDitta I MUST READ THAT FANFIC! WHO HAS THE LICENCE?! HOW DO WE GET IT MADE?!
@StockmanNate well then I guess we've come to a mutually beneficial understanding.
@StockmanNate only if you draw Spider-Farmar and his Spider-Sheep.
@AlexPaknadel hey @comicsgirls!
@StockmanNate hey Nate, you're pretty awesome. Keep being pretty awesome.
@ComicPrintingUK oh yeah.
